content.rendered:
Senior Technical Designer with F&B experience.
The potential candidates will need to have good technical knowledge and have been through a number of cycles of design, specification and delivery on site. Knowledge of operator standards and specification writing is essential, proficiency with Spec Designer an advantage. This is a great opportunity for someone looking to refine and build upon their experience to date and take an active role within our (dynamic and creative) team.

 

To apply please email your CV, Portfolio and an explanation of why you think you would be well suited to our practice, along with salary expectation to careers@goddardlittlefair.com

 

We look forward to hearing from you.
